alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Judith Gap; Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 20 at 9:09PM MST until February 21 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph with patchy blowing snow. * WHERE...Golden Valley, Judith Gap, Musselshell, Southern Wheatland and Northeastern Yellowstone. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will become hazardous due to slick and snowpacked roads and reduced visibility, including the Monday morning commute. Wind chills will be 10 to 20 below zero at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snowfall is expected tonight into Monday morning. Expect wind chills well below zero by Monday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Golden Valley; Judith Gap; Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Southern Wheatland
